Package com.olegtoropoff.petcareappointment.yandexs3

Class YandexS3Service

java.lang.Object
com.olegtoropoff.petcareappointment.yandexs3.YandexS3Service
All Implemented Interfaces:
IYandexS3Service
@Service public class YandexS3Service extends Object implements IYandexS3Service
Service class for managing interactions with Yandex S3. This class provides methods to upload, and delete files in an S3 bucket. It abstracts the operations of the S3 client for easier integration into the application.

  • Method Details

    • uploadFile

      public String uploadFile(String bucketName, String key, InputStream inputStream, long contentLength, String contentType)
      Uploads a file to a specified bucket in Yandex S3.
      Specified by:
      uploadFile in interface IYandexS3Service
      Parameters:
      bucketName - the name of the bucket
      key - the unique key for the file in the bucket
      inputStream - the InputStream containing the file data
      contentLength - the size of the file in bytes
      contentType - the MIME type of the file
      Returns:
      the public URL of the uploaded file
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an error occurs during the upload process
